data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Failed payment retry logic". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.bodyText:
{
  "stepKey": "customer-book-primary",
  "callCount": 1,
  "calls": [
    {
      "method": "POST",
      "path": "/api/v1/bizes/3AAOWoyfSrUqOjMKKCdw0tm7WdU/offers",
      "status": 201,
      "requestBody": {
        "name": "Primary Service Offer",
        "slug": "offer-qygc0w82",
        "executionMode": "slot",
        "status": "draft",
        "isPublished": false,
        "timezone": "UTC"
      },
      "responseBody": {
        "success": true,
        "data": {
